TEI.2.document_title: Elisha Roberts to Stephen F Austin, 07-18-2010

barker_notes.barker_summary: Elisha Roberts to Austin, July 18, 1828. Asking Austin to intercede witb tbe grantees of tbe border reserve to have his title confirmed in east Texas. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 74

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Elisha Roberts to Austin, July 18, 1828. Asking Austin to intercede witb tbe grantees of tbe border reserve to have his title confirmed in east Texas. (Omitted.)*/p* */div1*
